I'm seeing a few reports on this and we're looking to get more info on what might be going on.  If you're impacted, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look. 

In the meantime, download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and see if a force repatch can help serve as a workaround.
